title: "MOBILE Users"
body:
Anyone else feeling like the abundance of "mobile users" is cluster f***ing their friends list?

It would be awesome if Rito put a "hide mobile users" option like they have for offline.

replies.body:
Hahaha you're wrong OP, I don't have any issues with it at all!

Wanna know why? Because I don't have many friends!

Self-roasts are the best for some reason.

I agree, if you on mobile you're basically 'offline'.
I don't understand why 'mobile' friends come above 'away' friends, because at least 'away' friends have their client open! 'mobile' friends might not even be at home..

It does clutter the friends list terribly.
You can't even play league on your mobile anyway >_<, so whats the point of it? There are 10's of other major social networking sites that you can use to find out if someone is online with anyway!!
I would love an option to hide mobile users.

I wouldn't mind seeing who's currently using the mobile app. But you're right, seeing people who don't even have the app open isn't great design. Hopefully we'll get some kind of feature for this after the beta ends. 

pls rito :(
